meanings.sent1: The dog left some dooks in the yard.
meanings.sent2: Please clean up after your pet's dooks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped in some dooks on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The smell of the dooks was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: He dooks his opponent in the boxing ring.
meanings.sent2: It's not nice to dooks others during an argument.
meanings.sent3: I playfully dooks my friend on the shoulder.
meanings.sent4: The boxer's punch dooks his opponent to the ground.
meanings.sent5: She dooks the punching bag with all her strength.

meanings.definition: A sound made by a dog.
meanings.sent1: The dooks of the dog woke me up early.
meanings.sent2: I love hearing the dooks of my pet when I come home.
meanings.sent3: The dooks of the dog interrupted the quiet night.
meanings.sent4: The dooks of the dog echoed through the park.
meanings.sent5: The dooks of the dog were music to my ears.
